content: This is an emergency distress call broadcasting from the planet Gaia. If you're receiving this, please respond immediately. Hey, can I sniff you? Uh, that's definitely not possible or appropriate. This is a distress call, not whatever that was. I'm Stella. Who am I talking to? Yeah, sorry about that. Can I sniff you later? Seriously, that's not okay. Can we please stick to the basics here? I need to know who I'm actually talking to. So, what's your name? And how did you manage to pick up my distress signal? You're right. I didn't introduce myself. My name is Mustache. I accidentally stumbled upon this signal. Do you think this device can transmit smells? You know, for sniffing mustache, seriously, cut it out with the sniffing comments. That's not how this works.
title: AI NPCs will change games
author: MustacheAI

key_facts: FACT: A distress call is being broadcast from the planet Gaia.
FACT: The caller, Stella, is attempting to communicate with an unknown recipient.
FACT: Mustache is the name of the person who accidentally intercepted the signal.
FACT: The distress signal was picked up by a device capable of receiving interplanetary transmissions.
FACT: Stella expressed concern about inappropriate behavior during the communication attempt.
FACT: The conversation includes confusion about the nature of the transmission medium.
FACT: The device in question may have capabilities beyond standard audio transmission.
FACT: Mustache claims to have stumbled upon the signal unintentionally.
key_opinions: OPINION: The sender believes that sniffing is inappropriate and unprofessional in this context.
OPINION: Mustache seems to misunderstand the seriousness of the situation.
OPINION: The communication appears to be strained due to mismatched expectations.
OPINION: There is skepticism about whether the device can transmit sensory data like smell.
OPINION: The tone suggests frustration with the lack of clear protocol during emergency contact.
key_datapoints: DATA: The distress signal originates from the planet Gaia.
DATA: The signal was intercepted by a listener named Mustache.
DATA: The transmission includes non-verbal or sensory-related queries (e.g., 'can I sniff you?').
DATA: The device may support non-audio sensory transmission (e.g., smell).
